00001 /*
00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              OVERDRIVE / SOFT SATURATION
00004  *              waveshaping object which uses the equation 
00005  *              y = 1 - (1 - x)^n (positive quadrant only) 
00006  *              to shape the input signal.
00007  *******************************************************
00008  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00009  *              copyright © 2003 by Timothy A. Place
00010  *
00011  */
00012 
00013 // Check against redundant including
00014 #ifndef TT_OVERDRIVE_H
00015 #define TT_OVERDRIVE_H
00016 
00017 // Include appropriate headers
00018 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00019 
00020 
00021 /********************************************************
00022         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00023 
00024         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00025  ********************************************************/
00026 
00027 class tt_overdrive:public tt_audio_base{
00028 
00029         private:
00030                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00031                 typedef void (tt_overdrive::*function_ptr_1in_1out)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00032                 typedef void (tt_overdrive::*function_ptr_2in_2out)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00033                 function_ptr_1in_1out dsp_executor_mono;
00034                 function_ptr_2in_2out dsp_executor_stereo;
00035 
00036                 // Attributes Values & Variables 
00037                 tt_attribute_value_discrete             mode;
00038                 tt_attribute_value                              drive;
00039                 tt_attribute_value_bool                 defeat_dcblocker;
00040                 double                                                  last_input1;
00041                 double                                                  last_output1;
00042                 double                                                  last_input2;
00043                 double                                                  last_output2;
00044                 float                                                   s, b, nb, z, scale;
00045                 float                                                   preamp_db;
00046                 float                                                   preamp_linear;
00047         
00048         public:
00049                 enum selectors{                                                         
00050                         k_drive,                                                                // Attribute Selectors
00051                         k_defeat_dcblocker,
00052                         k_mode,
00053                         k_preamp
00054                 };
00055                 
00056 
00057                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00058                 tt_overdrive()                                                          // Constructor          
00059                 {
00060                         mode = 0;
00061                         preamp_db = 0;
00062                         preamp_linear = 1.;
00063                         set_attr(k_drive, 3.0); 
00064                         set_attr(k_defeat_dcblocker, 0.0);
00065                         clear();
00066                 }
00067 
00068                 ~tt_overdrive()                                                         // Destructor
00069                 {
00070                         ;
00071                 }
00072 
00073 
00074                 // ATTRIBUTES
00075                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00076                 {
00077                         switch (sel){                   
00078                                 case k_drive:
00079                                         drive = clip(val, float(1.0), float(10.0));
00080                                         // the following only apply to mode 1...
00081                                         {
00082                                                 float   f = (drive - 0.999) * 0.111;    // range is roughly [0.001 to 0.999]
00083                                                 int             i;
00084                                                 z = pi * f;
00085                                                 s = 1.0 / sin(z);
00086                                                 b = 1.0 / f;
00087                                                 b = clip(b, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00088                                                 nb = b * -1;
00089                                                 i = int(f);
00090                                                 if(f-i > 0.5) 
00091                                                         scale = sin(f * pi);
00092                                                 else 
00093                                                         scale = 1.;
00094                                         }
00095                                         return;
00096                                 case k_mode:
00097                                         mode = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00098                                         break;
00099                                 case k_defeat_dcblocker:
00100                                         defeat_dcblocker = val;
00101                                         break;
00102                                 case k_preamp:
00103                                         preamp_db = val;
00104                                         preamp_linear = decibels_to_amplitude(preamp_db);
00105                                         break;
00106                         }
00107                         
00108                         if(defeat_dcblocker && (mode == 0)){    // MODE 0 - no blocker
00109                                 dsp_executor_mono = &tt_overdrive::dsp_vector_calc_mono_nodcblock;
00110                                 dsp_executor_stereo = &tt_overdrive::dsp_vector_calc_stereo_nodcblock;
00111                         }
00112                         else if(mode == 0){                                             // MODE 0 - with blocker
00113                                 dsp_executor_mono = &tt_overdrive::dsp_vector_calc_mono;
00114                                 dsp_executor_stereo = &tt_overdrive::dsp_vector_calc_stereo;
00115                         }
00116                         else if(defeat_dcblocker){                              // MODE 1 - no blocker
00117                                 dsp_executor_mono =  &tt_overdrive::dsp_vector_calc_mono_sine_nodcblock;
00118                                 dsp_executor_stereo = &tt_overdrive::dsp_vector_calc_stereo_sine_nodcblock;
00119                         }
00120                         else{                                                                   // MODE 1 - with blocker
00121                                 dsp_executor_mono =  &tt_overdrive::dsp_vector_calc_mono_sine;
00122                                 dsp_executor_stereo = &tt_overdrive::dsp_vector_calc_stereo_sine;
00123                         }
00124                 }
00125 
00126                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00127                 {
00128                         switch (sel){
00129                                 case k_drive:
00130                                         return drive;
00131                                 default:
00132                                         return 0.0;
00133                         }
00134                 }
00135                 
00136                 
00137                 // METHOD: clear
00138                 void clear()
00139                 {
00140                         last_input1 = 0.0;
00141                         last_output1 = 0.0;     
00142                         last_input2 = 0.0;
00143                         last_output2 = 0.0;     
00144                 }
00145 
00146                 
00147                 /*****************************************************
00148                  * DSP LOOPS
00149                  *****************************************************/
00150                 
00151                 // Publically exposed interface for MONO dsp routine
00152                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00153                 {
00154                         (*this.*dsp_executor_mono)(in, out);    // Run the function pointed to by our function pointer
00155                 }
00156         
00157                 // Publically exposed interface for STEREO dsp routine
00158                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00159                 {
00160                         (*this.*dsp_executor_stereo)(in1, in2, out1, out2);     // Run the function pointed to by our function pointer
00161                 }
00162         
00163         
00164         private:
00165                 // DSP LOOP: mono
00166                 void dsp_vector_calc_mono(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00167                 {
00168                         tt_sample_value temp;
00169                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00170                         
00171                         while(temp_vs--){
00172                                 temp = *in->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00173 
00174                                 // Integrated DC Blocker:
00175                                 last_output1 = temp - last_input1 + (last_output1 * 0.9997);
00176                                 last_input1 = temp;
00177                                 temp = last_output1;
00178 
00179                                 // Here starts the Overdrive:
00180                                 float sign = 1.0;
00181                                 
00182                                 // the equation only works in the positive quadrant...
00183                                 // so we strip off the sign, apply the equation, and reapply the sign
00184                                 if (temp < 0.0) {
00185                                         temp = -temp;
00186                                         sign = -1.0;
00187                                 }
00188                                 
00189                                 if (temp > 1.0){                // clip signal if it's out of range
00190                                         *out->vector++ = clip(temp * sign, float(-1.0), float(1.0));
00191                                 }
00192                                 else{
00193                                         *out->vector++ = sign * (1.0 - exp(drive * log(1.0 - temp)));
00194                                 }
00195                         }
00196                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00197                 }
00198 
00199 
00200                 // DSP LOOP: stereo
00201                 void dsp_vector_calc_stereo(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, 
00202                         tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00203                 {
00204                         tt_sample_value temp_left, temp_right;
00205                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00206                         float sign_left, sign_right;
00207                         
00208                         while(temp_vs--){
00209                                 temp_left = *in1->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00210                                 temp_right = *in2->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00211                                 
00212                                 // Integrated DC Blocker:
00213                                 last_output1 = temp_left - last_input1 + (last_output1 * 0.9997);
00214                                 last_input1 = temp_left;
00215                                 last_output2 = temp_right - last_input2 + (last_output2 * 0.9997);
00216                                 last_input2 = temp_right;
00217                                 temp_left = last_output1;
00218                                 temp_right = last_output2;
00219 
00220                                 // Here starts the Overdrive:
00221                                 sign_left = 1.0;
00222                                 sign_right = 1.0;
00223                                 
00224                                 // the equation only works in the positive quadrant...
00225                                 // so we strip off the sign, apply the equation, and reapply the sign
00226                                 if(temp_left < 0.0){
00227                                         temp_left = -temp_left;
00228                                         sign_left = -1.0;
00229                                 }
00230                                 if(temp_right < 0.0){
00231                                         temp_right = -temp_right;
00232                                         sign_right = -1.0;
00233                                 }
00234                                 
00235                                 // LEFT CHANNEL
00236                                 if(temp_left > 1.0)             // clip signal if it's out of range
00237                                         *out1->vector++ = clip(temp_left * sign_left, float(-1.0), float(1.0));
00238                                 else
00239                                         *out1->vector++ = sign_left * (1.0 - exp(drive * log(1.0 - temp_left)));
00240 
00241                                 // RIGHT CHANNEL
00242                                 if(temp_right > 1.0)            // clip signal if it's out of range
00243                                         *out2->vector++ = clip(temp_right * sign_right, float(-1.0), float(1.0));
00244                                 else
00245                                         *out2->vector++ = sign_right * (1.0 - exp(drive * log(1.0 - temp_right)));
00246                                 
00247                         }
00248                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00249                 }
00250                 
00251                 
00252                 // DSP LOOP: mono - no dc blocking
00253                 void dsp_vector_calc_mono_nodcblock(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00254                 {
00255                         tt_sample_value temp;
00256                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00257                         
00258                         while(temp_vs--){
00259                                 temp = *in->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00260 
00261                                 float sign = 1.0;
00262                                 
00263                                 // the equation only works in the positive quadrant...
00264                                 // so we strip off the sign, apply the equation, and reapply the sign
00265                                 if (temp < 0.0) {
00266                                         temp = -temp;
00267                                         sign = -1.0;
00268                                 }
00269                                 
00270                                 if (temp > 1.0){                // clip signal if it's out of range
00271                                         *out->vector++ = clip(temp * sign, float(-1.0), float(1.0));
00272                                 }
00273                                 else{
00274                                         *out->vector++ = sign * (1.0 - exp(drive * log(1.0 - temp)));
00275                                 }
00276                         }
00277                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00278                 }

00281                 // DSP LOOP: stereo - no dc blocking
00282                 void dsp_vector_calc_stereo_nodcblock(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, 
00283                         tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00284                 {
00285                         tt_sample_value temp_left, temp_right;
00286                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00287                         float sign_left, sign_right;
00288                         
00289                         while(temp_vs--){
00290                                 temp_left = *in1->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00291                                 temp_right = *in2->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00292                                 sign_left = 1.0;
00293                                 sign_right = 1.0;
00294                                 
00295                                 // the equation only works in the positive quadrant...
00296                                 // so we strip off the sign, apply the equation, and reapply the sign
00297                                 if(temp_left < 0.0){
00298                                         temp_left = -temp_left;
00299                                         sign_left = -1.0;
00300                                 }
00301                                 if(temp_right < 0.0){
00302                                         temp_right = -temp_right;
00303                                         sign_right = -1.0;
00304                                 }
00305                                 
00306                                 // LEFT CHANNEL
00307                                 if(temp_left > 1.0)             // clip signal if it's out of range
00308                                         *out1->vector++ = clip(temp_left * sign_left, float(-1.0), float(1.0));
00309                                 else
00310                                         *out1->vector++ = sign_left * (1.0 - exp(drive * log(1.0 - temp_left)));
00311 
00312                                 // RIGHT CHANNEL
00313                                 if(temp_right > 1.0)            // clip signal if it's out of range
00314                                         *out2->vector++ = clip(temp_right * sign_right, float(-1.0), float(1.0));
00315                                 else
00316                                         *out2->vector++ = sign_right * (1.0 - exp(drive * log(1.0 - temp_right)));
00317                                 
00318                         }
00319                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00320                 }
00321 
00322 
00323                 void dsp_vector_calc_mono_sine_nodcblock(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00324                 {
00325                         tt_sample_value temp;
00326                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00327                         
00328                         while(temp_vs--){
00329                                 temp = *in->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00330                                 
00331                                 if(temp > b) 
00332                                         temp = 1.;
00333                                 else if(temp < nb) 
00334                                         temp = -1.;
00335                                 else 
00336                                         temp = sin(z * temp) * s;
00337                                 *out->vector++ = temp * scale;
00338                         }
00339                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00340                 }
00341                 
00342                 
00343                 void dsp_vector_calc_stereo_sine_nodcblock(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00344                 {
00345                         tt_sample_value         temp_left, temp_right;
00346                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00347                         
00348                         while(temp_vs--){
00349                                 temp_left = *in1->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00350                                 temp_right = *in2->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00351                                 
00352                                 if(temp_left > b) 
00353                                         temp_left = 1.;
00354                                 else if(temp_left < nb) 
00355                                         temp_left = -1.;
00356                                 else 
00357                                         temp_left = sin(z * temp_left) * s;
00358                                 
00359                                 if(temp_right > b) 
00360                                         temp_right = 1.;
00361                                 else if(temp_right < nb) 
00362                                         temp_right = -1.;
00363                                 else 
00364                                         temp_right = sin(z * temp_right) * s;
00365                                 
00366                                 *out1->vector++ = temp_left * scale;
00367                                 *out2->vector++ = temp_right * scale;
00368                         }
00369                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00370                 }

00374                 {                       
00375                         tt_sample_value temp;
00376                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00377                         
00378                         while(temp_vs--){
00379                                 temp = *in->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00380 
00381                                 // Integrated DC Blocker:
00382                                 last_output1 = temp - last_input1 + (last_output1 * 0.9997);
00383                                 last_input1 = temp;
00384                                 temp = last_output1;
00385 
00386                                 // Here starts the Overdrive:                           
00387                                 if(temp > b) 
00388                                         temp = 1.;
00389                                 else if(temp < nb) 
00390                                         temp = -1.;
00391                                 else 
00392                                         temp = sin(z * temp) * s;
00393                                 *out->vector++ = temp * scale;
00394                         }
00395                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00396                 }

00399                 void dsp_vector_calc_stereo_sine(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out1, tt_audio_signal *out2)
00400                 {
00401                         tt_sample_value         temp_left, temp_right;
00402                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;
00403                         
00404                         while(temp_vs--){
00405                                 temp_left = *in1->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00406                                 temp_right = *in2->vector++ * preamp_linear;
00407 
00408                                 // Integrated DC Blocker:
00409                                 last_output1 = temp_left - last_input1 + (last_output1 * 0.9997);
00410                                 last_input1 = temp_left;
00411                                 last_output2 = temp_right - last_input2 + (last_output2 * 0.9997);
00412                                 last_input2 = temp_right;
00413                                 temp_left = last_output1;
00414                                 temp_right = last_output2;
00415 
00416                                 // Here starts the Overdrive:                           
00417                                 if(temp_left > b) 
00418                                         temp_left = 1.;
00419                                 else if(temp_left < nb) 
00420                                         temp_left = -1.;
00421                                 else 
00422                                         temp_left = sin(z * temp_left) * s;
00423                                 
00424                                 if(temp_right > b) 
00425                                         temp_right = 1.;
00426                                 else if(temp_right < nb) 
00427                                         temp_right = -1.;
00428                                 else 
00429                                         temp_right = sin(z * temp_right) * s;
00430                                 
00431                                 *out1->vector++ = temp_left * scale;
00432                                 *out2->vector++ = temp_right * scale;
00433                         }
00434                         in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out1->reset(); out2->reset();
00435                 }
